channel.title: Matty's first autotalker
channel.description:
I've seen soo many scripts and i decided to try to create my own. i know how to make dtm's so im trying to learn how to add a colored background to a form, and i kinda have an idea how to add a form to my script, BUT i'm still a junior and still learning so hopefully that comes out great. heres my first basic one:
[code] {=========================================================================] [ Matty's first script ^_^ ] [ ] [ NAME : ERM.. FIRST SCRIPT ^_^. ] [ WRITER : Mattymat1313 ] [ DESCRIPTION : An auto talker. ] [ USAGE : So you can sit back and kick it. ] [ NOTES : Press ctrl+alt+s to stop it. ] [ ] [ ] [=========================================================================] [ Read below please =D ] [=========================================================================] [ Instructions. ] [=========================================================================] [ 1. Type your message ] [ 2. Set your first effect ] [ 3. Set your second effect ] [ 4. Get started =D ] [=========================================================================}
Program autochatter; {.Include srl/srl.scar}
Const TypeMessage = ''; //enter your message here Effect1 = ''; //enter first effect Effect2 = ''; //enter second effect
Begin SetupSrl; Repeat Wait(2000+Random(100)); TypeSend(Effect1 + Effect2 + TypeMessage + chr(13)); Wait(2000 + random(100)); Until(false); End. [/code]
i spent 3 hours learnings alot about scar, and 20 mins making this =P..
Also how can i adds the function to press a key to stop the script? any suggestions on how i could make this better would be accepted :D
Edit: oh yeah after each effect u must put a ":" example:
[code] Const TypeMessage = 'Hello i killed mudkipz'; //enter your message here Effect1 = 'flash2:'; //enter first effect Effect2 = 'wave2:'; //enter second effect [/code]

item.title: Matty's first autotalker
item.dc:creator: @TheDarkMage TheDarkMage
item.description:
@TheDarkMage wrote:

sendkeys is the probably the most basic ‘key sending’ (it’s kinda self-explanatory is it?) function there is do something like keyup(getkeycode(‘z’)); sleep(randomrange(161,235)); keyup(getkeycode(‘z’));

Read full topic

item.title: Matty's first autotalker
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

exps35:

If your’e going to bother setting up SRL, why not use SendKeys? Nothing in your script uses SRL, so calling for it in the beginning isn’t needed.

Sendkeys gets you banned, I got PMed by a mod on rs because of it…

Read full topic

item.title: Matty's first autotalker
item.dc:creator: @Mattymat1313 Mattymat1313
item.description:
@Mattymat1313 wrote:

I’ve seen soo many scripts and i decided to try to create my own. i know how to make dtm’s so im trying to learn how to add a colored background to a form, and i kinda have an idea how to add a form to my script, BUT i’m still a junior and still learning so hopefully that comes out great. heres my first basic one:

{=========================================================================]
[                   Matty's first script ^_^                              ]
[                                                                         ]
[           NAME        : ERM.. FIRST SCRIPT ^_^.                         ]
[           WRITER      : Mattymat1313                                    ]
[           DESCRIPTION : An auto talker.                                 ]
[           USAGE       : So you can sit back and kick it.                ]
[           NOTES       : Press ctrl+alt+s to stop it.                    ]
[                                                                         ]
[                                                                         ]
[=========================================================================]
[                        Read below please  =D                            ]
[=========================================================================]
[                           Instructions.                                 ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. Type your message                                                    ]
[ 2. Set your first effect                                                ]
[ 3. Set your second effect                                               ]
[ 4. Get started =D                                                       ]
[=========================================================================}

Program autochatter;
{.Include srl/srl.scar}

Const
  TypeMessage = ''; //enter your message here
  Effect1 = ''; //enter first effect
  Effect2 = ''; //enter second effect


Begin
 SetupSrl;
 Repeat
 Wait(2000+Random(100));
 TypeSend(Effect1 + Effect2 + TypeMessage + chr(13));
 Wait(2000 + random(100));
 Until(false);
End.

i spent 3 hours learnings alot about scar, and 20 mins making this =P…

Also how can i adds the function to press a key to stop the script? any suggestions on how i could make this better would be accepted

Edit: oh yeah after each effect u must put a “:” example:

Const
  TypeMessage = 'Hello i killed mudkipz'; //enter your message here
  Effect1 = 'flash2:'; //enter first effect
  Effect2 = 'wave2:'; //enter second effect

Read full topic
